attributes.action: Make all fireworks silent in UK like in the small Italian village.
attributes.additional_details: Many people on Face book have seen the vc of the greyhound in Scotland shaking on the kitchen floor in terror.
attributes.background:
Due to thousands of family pets being terrified of the loud noise of fireworks causing immense distress it would be thoughtful and helpful to these owners and their pets if people would sign this petition. No one is saying ban fireworks. 
PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION AND SHARE. THANKYOU.
